branchCategory.name: LVDH-V**-F/FN High Purity Chemical Valve, Manually Operated, Insert Bushing, Integral Fittings
branchCategory.description: <P>The LVD series are space saving, compact type, air operated high purity valves, which are designed to overcome the harsh environments often encountered in wet process applications. Its resin fluid path, makes it the perfect choice when working with acids, alkalis and ultra pure water. The LVD valves have PFA body materials and integral fittings (Hyper Fitting series LQ1 and clean series KP).</P>
